title: I got permanently Suspended for nothing at all HELP ME PLEASE !!!!
body: Ok so ime writing from an old account , i got a new account from my friend he gave it to me and i logged onto it for the first time bought $10 RP and then Pvp network had disconnected so i logged out then logged back in an when i tried to log back in it said that "the account has been permanently suspended" i ask my friend if he had been cursing in game and stuff he said no so then when i went on the email of the account to check why the account was suspended it said this " Actions that have been performed on your account are in violation of the League of Legends Terms of Use, Due to the severity of this violation, your League of Legends account has been banned until Tue Feb 22 22:22:22 UTC 2203 it had no explanation on why the account was banned ! "   RIOT PLEASE HELP !!! I WANNA PLAY LEAGUE !! I HAVE ALREADY SENT A TICKET BUT NO ONE HAS STILL RESPONDED !!! HELP !!!

replies.body: To me it sounds like your friend didnt tell you everything..
